shrimp.name: SchlickAniso
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Christope Schlick's anisotropic specular term. Isotropy controls surface isotropy, 0 being anisotropic, 1 being isotropic. Roughness controls apparent surface roughness, 0 being smooth, 1 being rough. Index of refraction controls the reflection coefficient contribution from the fresnel term. Dir is the anisotropy direction, defaults to dPdu. The specular color value is passed to aov_specularcolor, while the specular value, to the aov_specular AOV presets.
